dict.acceptation: 采访；访问；会见；（私下）提问；

sent.orig: An interview with Sandy Lam &Mark Lui. They talked about each song during the interview.
sent.trans: 今天播出了忆莲和雷颂德的录音访问，新碟歌曲逐首讲。

sent.orig: Common interview: personal interviews, group interviews, interview tests, combined interviews, waiting for the other interviews.
sent.trans: 常见的面试方法：个人面试、小组面试、测试面试、组合式面试、另类面试等待。

sent.orig: Interview assessments: effectively interview and screen the potential candidates.
sent.trans: 面试评估：对潜在候选人进行有效的面试与筛选。

sent.orig: Interview: We arrange interview in Dalian city from June.
sent.trans: 面试方式：六月份起开始统一安排面试，面试地点在大连进行。

sent.orig: You may be in need of an Interview Workout with The Interview Coach.
sent.trans: 每个答案后面均给出了点评意见，供你参考。
